directions: Combine water, tea bags, mint leaves, and orange-flavored drink mix in a saucepan; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer until tea is steeped, about 30 minutes. Add 2 cups cold water to tea and remove mint leaves and tea bags.
Stir sugar and lemon juice into tea until sugar is dissolved; refrigerate until chilled, at least 30 minutes. Stir vodka into tea before serving.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons fresh mint leaves, or more to taste
1 teaspoon orange-flavored drink mix (such as Tang®)
1 cup white sugar, or to taste
1/4 cup lemon-flavored vodka, or to taste (optional)
title: Grandma's Lemon Mint Ice Tea
